type.name: characterized_individual_physical_object
type.description: A characterized_individual_physical_object is an Individual_activity or a Product_as_individual.

description.p: A Possession_of_property is a relationship between a Physical_quantity_value and an individual physical object, and that indicates the individual physical object has the property.
The individual physical object can be either a Product_as_individual or an Individual_activity.

ul.li: the Physical_quantity_value that is 10 Kg; and
the Product_as_individual that is the widget with serial number 98/1234,

example.p: that indicates the mass of the widget is 10 kg, is a Possession_of_property.

If this mass of the widget is known to be within the range 9.9 kg to 10.1 kg, then the Physical_quantity_value is not identified by a numver but instead specified to lie within the Physical_quantity_range that is 9.9 kg to 10.1 kg.

explicit.name: base_independent_property
explicit.description: an Physical_quantity_value that is possessed by the described_element.
